page.title: 16LEISURE ON THE RIVER TRENT
page.content: Leisure activities on the river centre mainly on{Hazelford Ferry}. The fishing rights are leased to{ {Nottingham Piscatorial Society}and the bank marked out. Many competitions are held in the area throughout the season with fisherman coming from all over the country. Fish caught are{ {chubb,roach,dace,perch}and{bream,}with {barbel }being caught in the weir. Near{Hazelford Ferry}is an area zoned off for water-skiing. The weekend pleasure craft using this part of the river are moored at the marinas at{Farndon}and{Colwick}. There are about 3500 craft moored between{ {Nottingham}and{Gainsborough.}Cruisers and narrow boats use the river and link up with the canal network throughout the country. There are a few holiday houseboats permanently moored at{Hazelford Ferry.}
